songs.title: I Don't Wanna Throw Rice
songs.quote: Now while they're all outside, waiting to throw rice. What I want to throw will surely black her eyes. Cause I don't want to throw rice

songs.title: Dumb Blonde
songs.quote: Don't try to make me feel sorry for you. Just because I'm blonde. Don't think I'm dumb, cause this dumb blonde ain't nobody's fool

songs.title: Do I Ever Cross Your Mind
songs.quote: Sometimes I go walkin' through the fields where we walked, long ago in the sweet used-to-be. And the flowers still grow But they don't smell as sweet As they did when you picked them for me

songs.title: Take Me Back to the Country
songs.quote: Well this big city life is gettin' me down. There's just too many people around. There's dirt in the air and crime in the street, high-rise buildings and cold concrete. This rat race sure enough takes a toll, I wanna run off to my fishin' hole

songs.title: Making Plans
songs.quote: You're making plans to forget me. I'm making plans to miss you. I'm getting ready to grieve

songs.title: Wildflowers
songs.quote: When a flower grows wild it can always survive. Wildflowers don't care where they grow.

songs.title: Blue Valley Songbird
songs.quote: At fifteen she took to the highway, belongings and guitar in hand. She buried herself in her music, the one thing she did understand

songs.title: Steady As The Rain
songs.quote: Raindrops just keep falling down, beatin' out their rhythmic sounds, dancin' as they play their sweet refrain.

songs.title: I Get a Kick Out of You
songs.quote: I get no kick from champagne, mere alcohol don't thrill me at'all. Some people go for cocaine, I'm sure that if I took even one sniff, that would bore me terrifically too. Still, I get a kick out of you

songs.title: These Old Bones
songs.quote: These old bones will tell your story, these old bones will never lie. These old bones will tell you surely what you can't see with your eye.
